sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO REMT9000 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ALPAY_TX_AMNT , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , PERN_PYMT_SUM , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM,-5)),0)+1 ,5,'0') FROM REMT9000 WHERE SUBSTR(SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy')
) , #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #icncDt# , #rkfcdDt# , #rsgtnDt# , #pymtDt# , #eepnMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #eepnMnthIcm2013Aft# , #addMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #addMnthIcm2013Aft# , #retryPayQnty# , #freeDtyRetryPayQnty# , #alpayTxAmnt# , #locIncmTxAmt# , #pernPymtSum# , #sevePayCtrClutNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #amcrrClutInsnYn#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REMT9000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR=#calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , ICNC_DT=#icncDt# , RKFCD_DT=#rkfcdDt# , RSGTN_DT=#rsgtnDt# , PYMT_DT=#pymtDt# , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR=#eepnMnthIcm2012Bfr# , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT=#eepnMnthIcm2013Aft# , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR=#addMnthIcm2012Bfr# , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT=#addMnthIcm2013Aft# , RETRY_PAY_QNTY=#retryPayQnty# , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY=#freeDtyRetryPayQnty# , ALPAY_TX_AMNT=#alpayTxAmnt# , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT=#locIncmTxAmt# , PERN_PYMT_SUM=#pernPymtSum# , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT=#sevePayCtrClutNoteCtnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN=#amcrrClutInsnYn# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ALPAY_TX_AMNT , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , PERN_PYMT_SUM , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.HAN_NM, SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM, BB.BUSIN_CD, BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM, BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD, BB.TYP_OCCU_CD, fcBass0320CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, fcBassEx0350CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM, BB.FRST_EMYMT_DT, BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM, BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, BB.EMYMT_END_DT, BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD AS calcSevePayPsnDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD) AS calcSevePayPsnDivCdcommCdNm , AA.ICNC_DT , AA.RKFCD_DT , AA.RSGTN_DT , AA.PYMT_DT , AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , AA.RETRY_PAY_QNTY , AA.FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , AA.ALPAY_TX_AMNT , AA.SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , AA.PERN_PYMT_SUM , AA.AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT9000 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
ORDER BY AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR DESC , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD ASC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD) ASC , BB.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , AA.SYSTEMKEY DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM FROM REMT9000 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
)

SELECT AA.DPOB_CD ,AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.HAN_NM, SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM, BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM ,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD ,fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD) AS CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_NM ,AA.ICNC_DT ,AA.RKFCD_DT ,AA.RSGTN_DT ,AA.PYMT_DT ,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR ,AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR ,AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT ,AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR ,AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT ,AA.AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN ,AA.RETRY_PAY_QNTY ,AA.FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY ,AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM ,AA.ALPAY_TX_AMNT ,AA.LOC_INCM_TX_AMT ,AA.SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT FROM REMT9000 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD = #calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
BB.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD DESC
, AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REMT9000 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ALPAY_TX_AMNT , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , PERN_PYMT_SUM , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = #resnRegnNum# AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) , (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') || LPAD(NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM,-5)),0)+1 ,5,'0') FROM REMT9000 WHERE SUBSTR(SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM,1,4) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy') ) , #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #icncDt# , #rkfcdDt# , #rsgtnDt# , #pymtDt# , #eepnMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #eepnMnthIcm2013Aft# , #addMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #addMnthIcm2013Aft# , #retryPayQnty# , #freeDtyRetryPayQnty# , #alpayTxAmnt# , #locIncmTxAmt# , #pernPymtSum# , #sevePayCtrClutNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #amcrrClutInsnYn#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=(SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = #resnRegnNum# AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) AND CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DPOB_CD , NVL(SYSTEMKEY,'X')AS SYSTEMKEY , HAN_NM , ENG_NM , CHIN_CHAR_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , SX_DIV_CD , YOOBH_MNTH_DAY , SCLC_DIV_CD , NATN_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, NATN_CD) AS NATN_NM , fcBass0300ITEMNM(DPOB_CD, NATN_CD, '12') AS NATN_ITEM , DEPT_CD , BUSIN_CD , CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD , REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD , TYP_OCCU_CD , ODTY_CD , FRST_EMYMT_DT , EMYMT_DIV_CD , EMYMT_BGNN_DT , EMYMT_END_DT , PYSP_CD , HDOFC_CODTN_CD , RETRY_DT , RETRY_REAS_CTNT , FRGNR_DIV_CD , PSPT_NUM , STY_BGNN_DT , STY_END_DT , END_SCHL , END_DEGR_DIV_CD , PMTN_SCDU_DT , PYSP_PRMTN_SCDU_DT , REYMN_SCDU_DT , LOG_SVC_YR_NUM_CD , LOG_SVC_MNTH_ICM_CD , CURR_PYSP_APPMT_DT , CURR_DEPT_APPMT_DT , PERN_NOTE_CTNT , PYSP_GRDE_CD , DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD , DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , REPBTY_BUSIN_NM FROM PSNL0100 WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD= #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE RESN_REGN_NUM = #resnRegnNum# AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd#) AND RESN_REGN_NUM = #resnRegnNum#
DPOB_CD= #dpobCd#
